Parameters: int: The desired log priority: @B_android#util#Log#VERBOSE_E@, @B_android#util#Log#DEBUG_E@, @B_android#util#Log#INFO_E@, @B_android#util#Log#WARN_E@, or @B_android#util#Log#ERROR_E@.
String: A string tag to associate with each printed log statement.
LogPrinter(int, java.lang.String).Description: Create a new Printer that sends to the log with the given priority and tag.

println(java.lang.String).Description: Write a line of text to the output. There is no need to terminate the given string with a newline.

ClassDesc: Implementation of a @B_android#util#Printer_E@ that sends its output to the system log.
